title: Do Energy Efficiency Resource Standards Reduce Electricity Consumption?\ from Staggered State AdoptionThis paper is a revision of APEP-0142. See https://github.com/SocialCatalystLab/auto-policy-evals/tree/main/papers/apep_0142 for the previous version. (v4)
